quote: The secret of attraction is to love yourself
author: DEEPAK CHOPRA

quote: Nothing can dim the light that shines from within
author: MAYA ANGELOU

quote: The only courage you ever need is the courage to fulfill the dreams of your own life
author: OPRAH

quote: Am I good enough? Yes I am.
author: MICHELLE OBAMA

quote: Your life is already a miralce of chance waiting for you to shape it's destiny.
author: TONI MORRISON

quote: Embrace the glorious mess you are
author: Elizabeth Gilbert
